remarks: An infinite sum divided by a constant.  (Contributed by NM, 2-Jan-2006.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 23-Apr-2014.)
statement:
isumcl.1 $e |- Z = ( ZZ>= ` M ) $.
isumcl.2 $e |- ( ph -> M e. ZZ ) $.
isumcl.3 $e |- ( ( ph /\ k e. Z ) -> ( F ` k ) = A ) $.
isumcl.4 $e |- ( ( ph /\ k e. Z ) -> A e. CC ) $.
isumcl.5 $e |- ( ph -> seq M ( + , F ) e. dom ~~> ) $.
summulc.6 $e |- ( ph -> B e. CC ) $.
isumdivc.7 $e |- ( ph -> B =/= 0 ) $.
isumdivc $p |- ( ph -> ( sum_ k e. Z A / B ) = sum_ k e. Z ( A / B ) ) $.
$d B k $.
$d F k $.
$d M k $.
$d Z k $.
$d k ph $.
